name: The Dot Control
description:
Hi there, my name is Félix and I present you my very first game.

It is an experimental but complete game, where the important is not to win but to enjoy the present moment of the experience. You're encouraging to make you own interpretation of what you see, and your experience with this game must be personal.

If you are interested to talk about it, don't hesitate to contact me !

Enjoy

Discord : Azathothep#6656
